NAME: Signis
DIALOGUE: Tired of being puny and lame? Try EXP!
What's EXP? Well, glad you asked!
EXP is short for 'Experience Points'. By accumulating them you will increase your power and resistence
Thats called 'Leveling Up'. Pretty great, right? But now HOW to get EXP?
Thats simple enough. You get them by defeating the enemies you'll encounter on your journey!
Now get out there and stop being lame today!
